          <title>
            <string language="en">Feeling cold when wet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glaubende Kälte, wenn naß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Froid se sentant si humide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frio de sentimento quando molhado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Freddo ritenente una volta bagnato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αίσθημα κρύος όταν υγρός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frío de sensación cuando es mojado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This cartoon shows that you feel colder when wet because water evaporates from your skin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cartoon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karikatur zeigt, daß Sie kälter fühlen, 
wenn naß, weil Wasser von Ihrer Haut verdunstet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce dessin animé prouve que vous vous sentez plus
froid si humide parce que l'eau s'évapore de votre peau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este cartoon mostra que você sente mais frio 
quando molhado porque a água evapora de sua pele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo fumetto indica che ritenete più freddi una
volta bagnati perché l'acqua si volatilizza dalla vostra pelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα κινούμενα σχέδια δείχνουν ότι αισθάνεστε 
πιό κρύοι όταν υγρός επειδή το ύδωρ εξατμίζει από το δέρμα 
σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta historieta muestra que usted se siente más 
frío cuando es mojado porque el agua se evapora de su piel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karikatur</string>
          </keyword>
